content.text: Chilling Reign blankets the battlefield in icy power and legendary might. Featuring Ice- and Fighting-type Pokémon, dynamic abilities, and strategies that reward precision and timing, this expansion challenges Trainers to harness chilling strength and dominate with frost-forged tactics. With striking artwork, powerful Pokémon ex, and gameplay that cuts through the competition, Chilling Reign invites you to command the cold and claim victory.
